pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, April 2, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, April 2, 2016:

Halifax

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Halifax Seaport Farmers’ Market.

Halifax Seaport Farmers’ Market
1209 Marginal Road,
Halifax, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity only


4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nova Scotia, the Honourable Stephen McNeil.

Westin Nova Scotian
Seaport Room,
1181 Hollis Street,
Halifax, NS

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
  • Photo opportunity only


Media appearance

6:35 p.m. Interview with Steve Murphy - News at Six, CTV Atlantic


Please note: all times are local. 

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca 
613-957-5555
